name: Pink Frozen Margarita
preparation:
A Frozen Margarita is a beautiful, refreshing cocktail. But throw a little Campari in there, and a good thing gets even better—and pinker.

For more great Mexican-inspired drinks—and tacos, too!—head right this way.

Serves 6

Combine all the ingredients with 2 cups crushed ice in a blender, and blend on high speed for 30 seconds, until there are no longer chunks of ice.

Pour into six Highball glasses.

Garnish with lime slices, and serve immediately.
